Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only represents years of innovation and dedication but also offers unparalleled benefits tailored to enhance your specific needs. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special introductory price of $9500. I believe this investment will significantly add value to your endeavors and help you achieve greater success. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
